title: Top 10 trending phones of week 22
description: A very familiar name returned to the top of our trending chart in week 22 - the Galaxy A56 returning to a position it held for almost two months after its announcement. The Galaxy S25 Edge gained a spot to get the silver medal this time, while Honor's new mid-range star - the 400 Pro completed the podium. [#InlinePriceWidget, 13798, 1#] The Galaxy S25 Ultra took fourth, making it three Samsung phones in the leading quartet as the Infinix GT 30 Pro slid to fifth. The 15S Pro remains the best placed Xiaomi phone, but it's only sixth now after its victory last week. Behind it are...
excerpt: Samsung is once again the dominant force, having taken a step back for the past few weeks. A very familiar name returned to the top of our trending chart...
text: A very familiar name returned to the top of our trending chart in week 22 - the Galaxy A56 returning to a position it held for almost two months after its announcement. The Galaxy S25 Edge gained a spot to get the silver medal this time, while Honor's new mid-range star - the 400 Pro completed the podium. Honor 400 Pro 5G These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales. 512GB 12GB RAM$ 1,230.75£ 699.99Show all prices The Galaxy S25 Ultra took fourth, making it three Samsung phones in the leading quartet as the Infinix GT 30 Pro slid to fifth. The 15S Pro remains the best placed Xiaomi phone, but it's only sixth now after its victory last week. Behind it are the newly introduced vivo S30 Pro and its sibling from a different brand - the Poco X7 Pro. iQOO's Neo 10 is off to a good start, taking the ninth position, while the Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max completes this edition of the chart.
html:
A very familiar name returned to the top of our trending chart in week 22 - the Galaxy A56 returning to a position it held for almost two months after its announcement.

The Galaxy S25 Edge gained a spot to get the silver medal this time, while Honor's new mid-range star - the 400 Pro completed the podium.

Honor 400 Pro 5G

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
512GB 12GB RAM$ 1,230.75£ 699.99
Show all prices

The Galaxy S25 Ultra took fourth, making it three Samsung phones in the leading quartet as the Infinix GT 30 Pro slid to fifth.

The 15S Pro remains the best placed Xiaomi phone, but it's only sixth now after its victory last week. Behind it are the newly introduced vivo S30 Pro and its sibling from a different brand - the Poco X7 Pro.

iQOO's Neo 10 is off to a good start, taking the ninth position, while the Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max completes this edition of the chart.
